roleset.name: urinate
roleset.note: PISS-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. Frames file for 'piss' based on sentences in brown. (from piss.01-v)

example.name: piss-v: misdemeanor
example.text: I 've got a quarter of a million Germans in my state , and those krautheads tune in on Father Werther every night , and if he tells them-2 [*-2] to go out and piss in the public square , that 's what they do [*T*-1].

roleset.name: anger: non-phrasal
roleset.note: PISS-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.. (from piss.03-v)
PISSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, piss-v.02. (from pissed.01-j)

roles.note: arg3-intensifier from the verb particular to the verbal usage. (from pissed.01-j)

role.descr: additional reason for anger, if in addition to arg0

example.name: piss-v: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: But the far right sees it and it pisses the hell out of them .

example.name: piss-v: all args
example.text: He was a bright spark, but pissed the hell out of him with all his nervousness, especially after yelling about his poxy iPhone all those months
example.arg: especially after yelling about his poxy iPhone all those months

example.name: piss-v: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Maybe he-1 was pissed *-1 at him for not letting enough air out of the balls.
example.arg: for not letting enough air out of the balls

example.name: pissed-j: args 0, 1
example.text: Second marriage , groom was marrying the woman he'd had a longstanding affair with , and his adult kids were really , really pissed about it .

example.name: pissed-j: all args
example.text: My buddy just got back from vacation, but his cat is still pissed at him for leaving.

roleset.name: angry, phrasal variant: angry
roleset.note: PISS_OFF-V NOTES: Based on sentneces in call home-1. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from piss.02-v)
PISSED_OFF-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from pissed.03-j)
PO'ED_OFF-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from po'ed.02-j)

example.name: po'ed-j
example.text: So while normally , I would have been a tad po'ed at a 15 % increase in one year , I started laughing .
example.arg: at a 15% increas in one year

example.name: piss_off-v: all args
example.text: 'Cause Romney pissed him off with the Jeep-China lie.

example.name: pissed_off-j: Read this sentence 15 times, no idea what this relationship situation is...
example.text: ...but for her to twice beg for him back just because she knows that you and her are together is not on - I would be extremely pissed off about it if I were you !

roleset.name: drunk
roleset.note: PISSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from pissed.02-j)

example.name: pissed-j: both args
example.text: I-1 dealt with my wedding stress like any reasonable person.......by *PRO*-1 getting completely pissed on champagne and making my new husband go get me a cheeseburger at 1 am...

roleset.name: angry, irritable
roleset.note: PISSY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. related to piss.02. (from pissy.01-j)

role.descr: additional reason for anger, if in addition to arg0

example.name: pissy-j: both args
example.text: I know I 've been pissy about trolls on the forum lately , but it 's just a sort of last - ditch effort before I move the forum from " visit daily " to " visit weekly . "
